title: How to convince my mom to let me go back to school during COVID - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t know how old you are or if you can convince your mom. I’m sure your mom has been watching the News and Dr. Fauci’s concerns about in-person school. My friend is a teacher and he just had to be quarantined at home along with his wife and daughter because another teacher in his school was diagnosed with Covid. He and his family just had Covid tests and they were negative. I’m not sure whether he is back in school. There are risks to attending school in person and not only to you, but your family as well. I’m not sure if I had a school age kid that I would send them in-person myself.
